attributes.action: Give Free Gym membership to all
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Combat childhood Obesity and that of all Obesity by creating free Gym membership for all. Some gym memberships run in to hundreds of pounds a year. Often this is to much for a low income house. These are specifically areas the government should be targeting.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
